content.question: In his description of the United States Army’s plan “to capture and herd all the Lakota onto reservations once and for all” toward the end of the fourth paragraph, the author’s tone conveys which of the following?

choices.label: Disapproval of the Army’s dehumanizing treatment of the Lakota
Awe at the Army’s sophisticated strategies and superior weaponry
Indignation at the Army’s previous failures to follow through on the plan
Pride in the Army’s foresight and superior managerial skills

content.answer: Disapproval of the Army’s dehumanizing treatment of the Lakota

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
